
# [PupSpot](https://pupspot.github.io/)
![PupSpot](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

## Welcome to PupSpot! üêæ 

PupSpot helps dog lovers find popular, user-reported spots for dogs to meet up, play, and socialize. View a map of top dog-friendly locations and connect with fellow pet owners nearby.

## Core Features include 
 - Map with Pet-Friendly Spots
 - Pet Profiles
 - Event and Meetup Creation
 - Photo Albums and Media Sharing

PupSpot addresses this need by providing a community-driven platform where users can discover dog-friendly spots tailored to their preferences. Using a user-reported map, PupSpot allows owners to find various locations‚Äîfrom quieter, lesser-known parks with smaller groups to more active spots for social dogs. This flexibility lets users choose environments that align with their dog‚Äôs personality and comfort level.

## PupSpot Components

- [PupSpot Frontend](https://github.com/PupSpot/pupspot.github.io)
- [PupSpot Backend](https://github.com/PupSpot/pupspot-django) 

## Installation Steps

1. **Clone this repository**
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/PupSpot/pupspot.github.io.git
   ```
2. **Install Packages**
   ```bash
    npm run dev
    # or
    yarn dev
    # or
    pnpm dev
    # or
    bun dev
    ```
3. Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) with your browser to see the result.
